headline: PepsiCo Earnings Loom: Can Momentum Continue?
summary: PEP shares have finally shown some life over the past three months, gaining nearly 6%. With the company on deck to report results this week, can the recent momentum follow through?

headline: Is PepsiCo’s Stock a Bargain After Elliott’s $4B Stake and Strategy Push?
summary: Trying to figure out what to do with PepsiCo stock? You are definitely not the only one. Investors have been weighing the company’s direction, especially as the share price has made several notable moves in recent months. At its last close, PepsiCo traded at $139.70, a level that reflects both persistent long-term growth and more recent disruptions. Looking at the numbers, PepsiCo’s stock is currently down about 0.3% over the past week, off 4.6% in the past month, and a sobering 7% lower...

headline: Yum! Brands (YUM): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Since April 2025, Yum! Brands has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 2.6% while floating around $148.72. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 33.2% gain during that period.
